text:
Does anyone know the “super-secret” location for the Windows 11 23H2 enablement
package download so that users can just simply run the package on off-line
environments that are not connected to WSUS/Windows Update? 
--
%40LV2PR19MB5813.namprd19.prod.outlook.com
